org.araneaframework.jsp.util
Class AutomaticFormElementUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.jsp.util.AutomaticFormElementUtil
public class AutomaticFormElementUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for setting FormElement properties that are needed for rendering them in Aranea JSP with AutomaticTagFormElementTag.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org)
